name: Autotab
headline: AI agents reliable enough to do real work
description:
Autotab is a drop-in AI knowledge worker that uses a mouse and keyboard like you—so anything you can do, it can do. Show it how to perform your task, train it to be hallucination-proof by adding examples and providing feedback, and then run it on demand or on a schedule—either locally or in the cloud.

It achieves superhuman reliability, and can scale up on demand so your team doesn’t have to.

Autotab is already handling complex tasks thousands of steps long, from messaging customers to triggering payments and updating data across core systems of record like Salesforce, HubSpot, Google Sheets, and Jira.

Download the beta version of the app and get started right away, or sign up for a personalized onboarding: https://www.autotab.com

founders.name: Jonas Nelle, Founder
founders.description: Born and raised in Berlin. BA in Rationality from Harvard (convinced them to let me create a new major). Built data-driven applications at Palantir and Taktile (YC S20). Started and sold the first oracle for zero-knowledge rollups on Ethereum.

![OpenaAI logo](https://autotab.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fopenai.246ec349.png&w=640&q=75)![YCombinator logo](https://autotab.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FYC.ef3f0ac6.png&w=1080&q=75)
Real work, hallucination-proof reliability
Autotab uses a mouse and keyboard like you—so anything you can do, it can do.
### Collect Data
Whether its finding leads, collecting information for a report or migrating an entire system, Autotab can navigate extremely complex applications to collect data with ease.
### Fill Out Forms
Autotab can enter data directly into the systems you're already using, such as government forms, internal admin apps or partner systems like their ERP, RMS or TMS.
### Take Action
From sending messages on any platform to triggering refunds, Autotab can understand necessary context to take the correct action every time.
### ...And More
Not sure if Autotab can handle your task? Send a recording of your task to record@autotab.com and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

generated_description:
**Autotab: Revolutionizing Work through AI**

Autotab, founded in 2023 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S23, is on a mission to create AI agents that are reliable enough to do real work. Think of it as a drop-in AI knowledge worker that can replicate what you do with your mouse and keyboard—nothing too fancy, just useful.

This innovative tool works by learning from you. You show it how to complete a task, feed it examples, and provide feedback until it becomes hallucination-proof. Once trained, it can perform tasks on demand or on a schedule, either locally or in the cloud. What’s particularly exciting is its ability to scale on demand, meaning your team can offload repetitive tasks without worrying about capacity.

Autotab is capable of handling complex tasks that can stretch for thousands of steps. Whether it’s messaging customers, triggering payments, or updating records in systems like Salesforce, HubSpot, Google Sheets, and Jira, Autotab does it all with superhuman reliability.

The company currently employs a small but mighty team of just two individuals, working out of an undisclosed location. With backing from Harvard’s Harj Taggar, Autotab is well-poised for growth in the bustling fields of artificial intelligence, productivity, and enterprise automation.

Intrigued? You can download the beta version of the app [here](https://www.autotab.com) or schedule a personalized demo to see it in action. If you're unsure whether Autotab can tackle a specific task, just send a recording of what you need done to record@autotab.com, and they'll respond within 24 hours.

In a nutshell, Autotab is designed not just to assist, but to take over your repetitive tasks end-to-end, freeing you up for the more important work that requires a human touch. Whether you’re collecting data, filling out forms, or taking actions across applications, Autotab might just be the digital colleague you didn’t know you needed. 

For more information, visit their official website: [Autotab](https://autotab.com).
